article.title: Lockheed Martin Receives $147 Million Contract to Provide U.S. Coast Guard with Additional Maritime Patrol Aircraft and Mission System Pallets
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Lockheed Martin has received a $147.5 million contract to provide the U.S. Coast Guard with three HC-144A Ocean Sentry aircraft and five Mission System Pallets (MSPs). These additions will provide significant capabilities for the Coast Guard when responding to critical missions.
